name: ChatProp
author: ChatProp

sections.description:
ChatProp is an AI-powered real estate assistant that engages website visitors, recommends properties, and automates lead management. Designed to help real estate agents save time and close more deals, ChatProp integrates seamlessly with WordPress websites, syncing property listings and using AI to enhance the user experience.

Full Description

ChatProp is a cutting-edge AI-powered assistant designed for real estate agents to manage leads, recommend properties, and automate appointment scheduling. It leverages AI and machine learning to deliver a personalized experience to each visitor, recommending properties based on preferences, and helping you manage leads through an integrated CRM.

Key Features:

  • Property Recommendations: ChatProp integrates with your WordPress property listings, using AI to suggest relevant properties to visitors based on their preferences and browsing behavior.
  • Lead Pre-Qualification: Automatically captures and qualifies leads, allowing you to focus on serious prospects.
  • Appointment Scheduling: Visitors can easily schedule property showings through ChatProp’s calendar integration, reducing no-shows and simplifying appointment management.
  • All-in-One CRM: Manage visitor data and lead information in one place, streamlining follow-ups and keeping leads organized.
  • 24/7 Availability: ChatProp is always available, allowing visitors to ask questions, get property recommendations, and book showings, even when you’re offline.
  • Multilingual Support: Communicate with potential clients in over 50 languages, enabling you to reach a global audience.
  • Analytics: Get insights into visitor interactions and lead activity to refine your sales strategy.

Benefits:

  • Increase Conversions: Convert more website visitors into leads by providing personalized property recommendations.
  • Save Time: Automate lead qualification and scheduling, letting you focus on closing deals.
  • Enhance Client Experience: Deliver an interactive, user-friendly experience for visitors to find properties and book showings.
  • Boost Productivity: Use the integrated CRM to manage leads efficiently and ensure no opportunity is missed.

External Services

ChatProp connects to external services hosted by Fiaca LLC to ensure full functionality:

  1. ChatProp Web Application:
    URL: https://app.chatprop.io
    This service manages AI-powered property recommendations, lead management, and visitor interactions.

  2. ChatProp Functions API:
    URL: https://functions.chatprop.io
    Handles the synchronization of property data, visitor interactions, and lead information between your WordPress site and ChatProp’s cloud-based system.

  3. Remote JavaScript & CSS:
    ChatProp uses remote JavaScript and CSS files to ensure that users always receive the latest updates and features without manual intervention:

    • JavaScript: https://app.chatprop.io/chatbot/scripts/chatprop.js
    • CSS: https://app.chatprop.io/chatbot/scripts/chatprop.styles.css

Why Remote Files?
ChatProp operates as a dynamic SaaS platform, and loading these files remotely ensures that all users have the most current version of the chatbot interface, enabling:
– Automatic delivery of new features and improvements.
– The latest bug fixes and security patches.
– Seamless integration with ChatProp’s cloud-based services.

Privacy Policy & Terms of Service

By using ChatProp, you agree to the terms and conditions set by Fiaca LLC.
– Privacy Policy
– Terms of Service

License

This plugin is proprietary software owned by Fiaca LLC. All rights reserved. For more details, refer to the Private License Agreement.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation (Recommended)

  1. Click Install Now.
  2. Once the installation is complete, click Activate.
  3. After activation, you’ll be prompted to create a ChatProp account or sign in.
  4. Once your account is set up, ChatProp will sync with your property listings in WordPress to start recommending properties and managing leads.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the ChatProp plugin ZIP file.
  2. In your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins > Add New and click Upload Plugin.
  3. Select the ChatProp ZIP file from your computer and click Install Now.
  4. Once installed, click Activate.
  5. After activation, you’ll be prompted to create a ChatProp account or sign in.
  6. Once your account is set up, ChatProp will sync with your property listings in WordPress to start recommending properties and managing leads.
sections.faq:
Is ChatProp free to use?

ChatProp offers a free plan with limited features. To unlock additional conversations and advanced functionality, you can upgrade to a paid plan.

How does ChatProp recommend properties?

ChatProp connects to your property listings in WordPress and uses AI algorithms to suggest properties that best match visitor preferences and search behavior.

How do I connect ChatProp to my website?

After installing and activating the plugin, sign in or create a ChatProp account. Once connected, the plugin will sync with your property listings and start recommending properties and managing leads automatically.

Is my data secure?

Yes, ChatProp complies with data security standards, including GDPR. All visitor data and leads are securely stored on ChatProp’s cloud-based platform.

How do I manage leads and appointments?

Leads and appointments are managed through the ChatProp SaaS dashboard, which can be accessed from any device.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.1:

  • Improved documentation and plugin description.
  • Enhanced sync functionality with WordPress property listings.
